data.name: Underling Uprising
data.detailed_description:
Underling Uprising is an action-packed Beat 'Em Up with Saturday Morning Cartoon aesthetics. Play as the Underlings, a group of experiments created by evil mad science, as you seek revenge on your previous captor, the maniacal Dr. Baldrick! On their journey, the Underlings will need to fight across the globe, overcome the demons of their pasts, and accept help from unexpected places.


  • Fast-paced, arcade inspired, edge-of-your-seat fighting action!
  • Colorful hand-drawn visuals inspired by Saturday Morning Cartoons from our childhoods!
  • 4 Playable Characters with fun, interactive movesets and storylines!
  • Amazing electronic soundtrack with hints of retro and 80's synthwave aesthetics!
  • Narrative-driven experience with a unique and quirky cast!
  • Multiple Difficulties, Character Specific Interactions, and Different Endings!
  • Up to 4 Player Co-Op and Versus Modes!

data.short_description: Play as the Underlings, a group of experiments created by evil mad science, as you seek revenge on your previous captor, the maniacal Dr. Baldrick! On their journey, the Underlings will need to fight across the globe, overcome the demons of their pasts, and accept help from unexpected places.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10 SDK.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Xcode. Targeting Apple Silicon with IL2CPP scripting backend requires macOS Catalina 10.15.4 and Xcode 12.2 or newer.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
